alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 08 at 7:12PM PST until December 09 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph, except isolated gusts up to 50 mph in the foothills. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Beaches and San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Beaches; San Luis Obispo County Inland Central Coast
